Action.author: tonyyang132
Action.body: I digged a bit further and found the issue in https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric/blob/master/common/tools/cryptogen/ca/generator.go#L103. No matter what is provided as SANS in crypto-config.yaml, current logic assumes they are host names and put them in template.DNSNames. I believe a more reasonable approach would be to examine the content of SANS and if it's an IP address, put it in template.IPAddresses.

Action.author: tonyyang132
Action.body: Should have done a better job searching for existing work items before raising this one. It turns out that there has already been a mention of the issue - https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FAB-4364.
